Mod list.

Wow that's a lot of mods. I think it'll be hard for anybody to make a guess.

In your ksp.log I'm seeing some Null Reference Exceptions and the last one is for a mod you don't seem to have on your list named KspCraftOrganizer. Maybe - MAYBE - that's the one causing the problem.

You also have a mod named ManeuverAutopilot. I don't know anything about it but maybe it disables input when there's a maneuver node, so it can autopilot you? No clue.

Neither of those mods did you list above, so I expect you may be running a lot of mods you don't know you're running.
